THE LAMB, Broad Street, Builth Wells.
Recently taken over by new owners who have developed an excellent bar snack menu complemented by excellent real ales that are kept to a very high standard. Well worth a visit when you are in the area

THE LAMB, Broad Street, Builth Wells.
Recently taken over by new owners, Nic & Petra who have developed an excellent bar snack menu complemented by excellent real ales and a wide range of  beers, lagers and cider many on hand pull and are all kept to a very high standard. Well worth a visit when you are in the area especially Welsh Show week and Motorcycle weekend when there is usually a real ale beer festival in the beer garden.
